NEW: ChatGPT-5.1 is live.

Here's how to (best) use it:

+++ MODEL

✦ Go to the top left, click on "ChatGPT".
✦ Make sure to select the new ChatGPT-5.1.
✦ The most advanced model is still "Thinking".

+++ CUSTOMIZATION

✦ On the bottom left, click on your profile.
✦ Click on the menu → then  "Personalization".
✦ Make sure to "Enable customization". It's key.

+++ BASE STYLE AND TONE

✦ This is the new upgraded feature.
✦ Pick the personality of your ChatGPT.
✦ I personally love to use "Efficient", it's my style.

+++ CUSTOM INSTRUCTIONS

✦ This is where true magic happens.
✦ Explain exactly how you want ChatGPT to talk.
✦ I wrote a blog on it: https://lnkd.in/dCjcTz_A.

+++ ADVANCED

✦ Scroll down, and click on "Advanced".
✦ Make sure to select everything there.
✦ Pro tip: know how to manage memories.
✦ I wrote a guide here: https://lnkd.in/dA3FGZjc.

You learned something?
